description: The last in a series of films of the ABC's (American Broadcasting Corporation) television coverage of the 1976 Republican Convention in Kansas City. Covers the climax of the convention from the main control room, showing the ballot for the nomination, beginning as the ABC goes on the air and ending just after Gerald Ford wins the nomination. Suitable for upper secondary level.
